resource: 1002406.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002406.derived=false 1002406.vtc=true 1002406.description=Satellite radio requires XM<sup>®</sup> monthly service fee. See your Toyota dealer for further details. Reception of the satellite signal may vary depending on location. All fees and programming subject to the terms and conditions available at www.xmradio.com. Available only in the 48 contiguous United States.
